remarks: The recursive definition generator on upper integers is a function.  See comment in ~ om2uzrdg .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2015.)
statement:
om2uz.1 $e |- C e. ZZ $.
om2uz.2 $e |- G = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , C ) |` _om ) $.
uzrdg.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
uzrdg.2 $e |- R = ( rec ( ( x e. _V , y e. _V |-> <. ( x + 1 ) , ( x F y ) >. ) , <. C , A >. ) |` _om ) $.
uzrdg.3 $e |- S = ran R $.
uzrdgfni $p |- S Fn ( ZZ>= ` C ) $.
$d A y $.
$d C x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G y $.
